properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 7 at 4:09PM AKST until February 10 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks, AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Plan on difficult travel
conditions. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches, are
expected. Visibility will be reduced to one half mile
or less at times Saturday night through Sunday night.

* WHERE...Lower Kobuk and Noatak Valleys.

* WHEN...3 PM Saturday to 6 AM Monday.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds gusting as high as 30 mph will cause
areas of blowing and drifting snow.
properties.instruction:
A Winter Weather Advisory for snow and blowing snow means periods
of snow and blowing snow will cause travel difficulties.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM SATURDAY TO 6 AM AKST MONDAY
